item.description:
Posting this as a tentative plan, but if we get too much snow, may have to cancel.  Otherwise, the weather for the weekend is looking good...

 

As I work on getting back in hiking form after a long hiatus, another afternoon walk at Northwest Park in Windsor. It will be more of a walk in the woods than a serious hike as we'll cover 2-3 miles of rolling trails, likely with views of Rainbow Reservoir. Meet in the parking lot at 11:00 and expect to be out on the trail 1-2 hours at a social (slow) pace. Kids and dogs welcome.   Check back that morning to see if I have updated the plans.

 

=== Legal Stuff ===

By clicking on "Yes" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows: In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Area Hiking permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me with my dogs in the parking lot area.

group.name: The Hartford Area Hiking™ Meetup Group

item.name: Northwest Park in Windsor (short notice, weather permitting)
